limitations.limitation_paraphrased: API request timeout limit is 10 minutes
limitations.verbatim_snippet: HTTP response code 504 - Gateway Timeout is returned when a request exceeds 10-minutes execution time
limitations.page_title: Operation Limits in Dynamics 365 Business Central

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Maximum OData batch operations limited to 100
limitations.verbatim_snippet: Max OData Batch Operations: 100
limitations.page_title: Operation Limits in Dynamics 365 Business Central

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: OData speed limit restricts to 6000 requests per 5-minute window
limitations.verbatim_snippet: OData V4 Speed Limit: 6000 requests per 5-minute sliding window
limitations.page_title: Operation Limits in Dynamics 365 Business Central

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Maximum concurrent OData requests limited to 5 per user
limitations.verbatim_snippet: OData V4 Max Concurrent Requests: 5 per user
limitations.page_title: Operation Limits in Dynamics 365 Business Central

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: OData filtering does not support OR operator across different fields
limitations.verbatim_snippet: The 'OR' operator is not supported on distinct fields on an OData filter

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Deep patching operations are not supported
limitations.verbatim_snippet: Business Central doesn't support deep patching

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Concurrent sessions limited to 5 sessions for NetSuite Connector
limitations.verbatim_snippet: Default concurrent sessions for NetSuite Connector: 5 sessions

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: API returns maximum 1000 objects per request
limitations.verbatim_snippet: The API returns a maximum of 1,000 objects per request

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: SuitePeople US Payroll only supports US federal, state, and local taxes
limitations.verbatim_snippet: SuitePeople U.S. Payroll only supports U.S. federal, state, and local payroll taxes

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Direct Workforce Management integrations with third-party payroll not supported in US
limitations.verbatim_snippet: Direct integrations between Workforce Management and third-party payroll providers aren't supported in the U.S.

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: REST API does not support upsert operation using external ID
limitations.verbatim_snippet: Upsert operation using external ID

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: REST API does not support approval actions like Submit, Approve, Reject
limitations.verbatim_snippet: Approval actions (Submit, Approve, Reject, Unapprove)

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: API rate limited to 500 requests per minute per company
limitations.verbatim_snippet: API calls are throttled at 500 requests per minute per realmId

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Maximum 10 concurrent API requests per company
limitations.verbatim_snippet: Applications cannot make more than 10 API requests to the same realmId concurrently

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Change Data Capture only returns changes for last 30 days and maximum 1000 objects per call
limitations.verbatim_snippet: Look-back time can be up to 30 days and maximum number of objects that can be returned in a response is 1000

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Payroll API is limited to beta status for Time tracking and Deductions
limitations.verbatim_snippet: Payroll API for Time tracking and Deductions use cases in Beta
limitations.page_title: Is there a QuickBooks Online Payroll API?

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Integration only compatible with specific QBO plans and payroll services
limitations.verbatim_snippet: compatible with Quickbooks Online Plus with Payroll in the United States, India and Canada

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: API rate limited to 60 calls per rolling 60 second window
limitations.verbatim_snippet: 60 calls in a rolling 60 second window

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Daily API limit of 5000 calls per rolling 24 hour window
limitations.verbatim_snippet: 5000 calls in a rolling 24 hour window

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Request size ceiling of 50 nodes per request to avoid 3.5MB limit
limitations.verbatim_snippet: a ceiling of about 50 nodes per request is practical - this will ensure a request does not exceed the maximum size of 3.5MB

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Basic API Key authentication not supported
limitations.verbatim_snippet: The Xero API does not support basic API Key authentication

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Single page apps not currently supported
limitations.verbatim_snippet: Single page apps are not currently supported

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: All access tokens expire after 30 minutes
limitations.verbatim_snippet: All Xero access tokens expire after 30 minutes

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Not suitable for businesses with very high transaction volumes
limitations.verbatim_snippet: Xero is not suitable for all types of business, particularly those with very high transaction volumes

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Daily API requests limited by formula: 1000 x (1 + number of Active Connected Companies)
limitations.verbatim_snippet: 1,000 x (1 + number of Active Connected Companies [ACCs])

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Concurrent requests limited to 10 per Active Connected Company
limitations.verbatim_snippet: 10 requests per ACC

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Hard DoS protection limit of 1000 requests per minute per IP
limitations.verbatim_snippet: 1,000 requests per minute from any IP Address

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Supplemental data cannot be used for line-level properties or querying
limitations.verbatim_snippet: currently available only at the record level and cannot be used to interact with line-level properties

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: QuickBooks for Mac OS not supported
limitations.verbatim_snippet: Codat doesn't support Intuit QuickBooks for Mac OS

limitations.limitation_paraphrased: Sage 200 Professional Desktop not supported
limitations.verbatim_snippet: Sage 200 Professional (Desktop) is not supported

limitation_categories_found: API rate limits and throttling restrictions
Batch size limitations for bulk operations
notes: All findings sourced from official vendor documentation only
QuickBooks Online CDC limitation confirmed: 30-day lookback and 1000 object maximum
Some vendor documentation pages had loading issues but core limitations were captured
Rate limits and operational constraints well documented across all platforms
Payroll limitations vary significantly by platform and geographic region
